sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; import Cards from "react-bootstrap/Cards"; export default function Weather() { let weatherData = { city: "Berlin", date: "Tuesday 17:00", temperature: "17", description: "Foggy", imgUrl: "http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/01d@2x.png", minTemperature: 12, maxTemperature: 20, humidity: 30, wind: 6 }; return (

{weatherData.city}

{weatherData.date}

{weatherData.temperature} °C / °F

{weatherData.description}

Details
  • Lowest:{weatherData.minTemperature}°C
  • Highest:{weatherData.maxTemperature}°C
  • Humidiy:{weatherData.humidity}%
  • Wind:{weatherData.wind}km/h
); }
